property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 
    'ChangePurchaseRequisitionLine' || '::' || "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"."ID"      AS "ID",
    "PurchaseRequisitionLine"."ID"                                                         AS "PurchaseRequisitionLine",
    "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"."Time"                                               AS "Time",
    "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"."ChangedBy"                                          AS "ExecutedBy",
    "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"."Attribute"                                          AS "ChangedAttribute",
    "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"."ExecutionType"                                      AS "ExecutionType",
    "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"."OldValue"                                           AS "OldValue",
    "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"."NewValue"                                           AS "NewValue"
FROM "o_custom_PurchaseRequisitionLine" AS "PurchaseRequisitionLine"
    LEFT JOIN "c_o_custom_PurchaseRequisitionLine" AS "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"
        ON "PurchaseRequisitionLine"."ID" = "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"."ObjectID"
WHERE "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"."Attribute" IN ('ReleaseIndicator', 'NetUnitPrice' , 'Quantity' , 'Description' , 'Vendor', 'Currency')
    AND "PurchaseRequisitionLine_Changes"."Time" IS NOT NULL
